item.title: Call me 'she' but not 'woman'
item.description: The world beyond the gender binary is vast and diverse. As a queer facilitator, I’ve come to appreciate the value of writing my pronouns behind my name when it shows up in a video call or on Slack. It makes it easier for people to be good allies to those of us who have come to use pronouns they weren’t assigned at birth. As a non-binary person, one of the choices I have had to make was on the topic of pronouns.
